src:
Kevin/Marcus ke Babak Kedua Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019 Usai Bekuk Malaysia
06 Nov 2019, 08:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pasangan ganda putra Indonesia, Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo/Marcus Fernaldi Gideon, sukses membekuk wakil Malaysia, Goh V Shem/Tan Wee Kiong, pada babak pertama Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019 dengan skor 21-15, 21-16.
Berkat hasil positif ini, Kevin/Marcus berhak lolos ke babak kedua turnamen level Super 750 tersebut. Selain itu, hasil ini memperpanjang dominasi Kevin/Marcus atas Goh/Tan menjadi 7-1.
"Pasangan Malaysia punya pertahanan yang kuat dan serangan yang tajam. Tetapi untungnya kami bisa beradaptasi dengan kondisi lapangan dengan cepat dan bisa langsung tampil bagus dari awal," kata Kevin dalam rilis dari PBSI.
text:
Kevin / Marcus to the Second Round of Fuzhou China Open 2019 After Defeating Malaysia
Nov 6 2019, 08:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian men's doubles pair Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo / Marcus Fernaldi Gideon, successfully captured the Malaysian representative, Goh V Shem / Tan Wee Kiong, in the first round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 with a score of 21-15, 21-16.
Thanks to these positive results, Kevin / Marcus has the right to qualify for the second round of the Super 750 level tournament. In addition, these results extend Kevin / Marcus' dominance over Goh / Tan to 7-1.
"The Malaysian couple have strong defenses and sharp attacks. But fortunately we can adapt to field conditions quickly and can immediately perform well from the start," Kevin said in a release from PBSI.
